Package io.github.icrazyblaze.twitchmod

Class CommandHandlers

java.lang.Object
io.github.icrazyblaze.twitchmod.CommandHandlers
public class CommandHandlers extends Object
This class contains every method used by commands registered in the ChatPicker class.
See Also:
ChatPicker
